title: Boghossian on Woke Atheism and Evangelicalism: Great Realignment?
description:
Peter Boghossian did a podcast where he shared his idea of the Great Realignment. He sees woke evangelicals and woke atheists who are religious and he wonders if there is a connection. 

I see a connection but different from his. It is a modernist/post-modern split. I think modernism (like Sam Harris) has a problem with knowledge. They tend to see propositional truth as the only truth. So I walk through some Peterson stuff, some Vervaeke stuff and show how in fact secularism has pressured "progressive evangelicals" into a more secular eschatology. Well meaning people are hopping on the Critical Theory moral signaling train because for them the price is cheap. Lots of stuff in this video. 

Podcast where Boghossian brings out the idea https://anchor.fm/intellectualexplorersclub/episodes/Peter-Boghoassian---The-Great-Realignment-e3vobd
https://twitter.com/peternlimberg/status/1126903924479414277

Unbelievable episode https://www.premierchristianradio.com/Shows/Saturday/Unbelievable/Episodes/Peter-Boghossian-vs-Tim-McGrew-A-manual-for-creating-atheists

JBP maps of meaning 2015 https://youtu.be/rlGqUfIgJfc
Vervaeke on Knowledge https://youtu.be/V4UydKAamu0
Against Murderism https://slatestarcodex.com/2017/06/21/against-murderism/
Unbelievable on woke religion https://www.premierchristianradio.com/Shows/Saturday/Unbelievable/Episodes/Unbelievable-Is-Identity-Politics-the-new-religion-James-Lindsay-Esther-O-Reilly-and-Neil-Shenvi

#peterboghossian #workreligion #progressiveevangelicals
